chatbot.description: The customer is complaining that the chatbot is not helping with their issue
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's ability to assist with basic tasks and provide better support for customers on pre-paid plans

complaint.description: The customer lost their phone and needs to claim from insurance, but there is no way to blacklist their number. They are frustrated with the call centre and the chatbot's lack of assistance.
complaint.suggestion: Provide a direct option for customers to blacklist their number and improve the support provided by the call centre

meta.review_content:
Call Centre is useless.

i recently lost my phone. 
I need to claim from insurance - but there is no way for me to blacklist my number.
You call the line and then they want to put you through to the bot!!!! - the bot is not helping!!!

This is a stupid problem to have!!! but its a problem all the same!!!

Thier website only has support for people that are on contract since they can log in and have options avialable... but us on pre-paid have no one except the bot to help us with the most basic of tasks!!!! Common!!!!
